question: The "Chinchorro Mummies" are discovered from which nation?
explanation: Chinchorro Mummies are the mummies of individuals of Chinchorro Culture of South America. This culture was located in Chile. The oldest anthropogenically modified Chinchorro mummy dates from around 5050 B.C. These mummies were discovered from the Atacama Desert. They are the oldest examples of artificially mummified human remains.
